indications: raldesy tmis indicated treatment major depressive disorder ( mdd ) adults .
contraindications: starting : 150 mg orally divided doses daily . may increased 50 mg per day every three four days . maximum : 400 mg per day divided doses ( 2.1 ) . administer raldesy shortly meal light snack ( 2.1 ) . discontinuing raldesy , gradually reduce dose ( 2.5 ) .
warningsAndPrecautions: supplied raldesy tmcontains 10 mg/ml trazodone hydrochloride . clear , colorless solution supplied : 150 ml amber glass bottle ndc 30698-455-03 child-resistant cap along 10 ml calibrated oral dosing syringe bottle adapter . 150 ml white , opaque , high-density polyethylene ( hdpe ) bottle ndc 30698-455-02 child-resistant cap along 10 ml calibrated oral dosing syringe bottle adapter . 300 ml amber glass bottle ndc 30698-455-04 child-resistant cap along 10 ml calibrated oral dosing syringe bottle adapter . 300 ml white , opaque , hdpe bottle ndc 30698-455-01 child-resistant cap along 10 ml calibrated oral dosing syringe bottle adapter . bottle , bottle adapter dosing syringe placed carton . storage handling store 20°c 25°c ( 68°f 77°f ) . excursions permitted 15°c 30°c ( 59°f 86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . protect light . discard unused raldesy remaining bottle 30 days first opening bottle .
adverseReactions: raldesy contraindicated patients taking , within 14 days stopping , monoamine oxidase inhibitors ( maois ) , including maois linezolid intravenous methylene blue , increased risk serotonin syndrome [ ( 5.2 ) , ( 7.1 ) ] .
indications_original:
RALDESY
 
  TMis indicated for the treatment of major depressive disorder (MDD) in adults.
contraindications_original: Starting dosage: 150 mg orally in divided doses daily. May be increased by 50 mg per day every three to four days. Maximum dosage: 400 mg per day in divided doses ( 2.1 ). Administer RALDESY shortly after a meal or light snack ( 2.1 ). When discontinuing RALDESY, gradually reduce dose ( 2.5 ).
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
How Supplied
                       RALDESY
 
  TMcontains 10 mg/mL of trazodone hydrochloride. It is a clear, colorless solution and is supplied as:

 
                  150 mL amber glass bottle
                  
                     NDC 30698-455-03 with child-resistant cap along with a 10 mL calibrated oral dosing syringe and bottle adapter.
                  
                  150 mL white, opaque, high-density polyethylene (HDPE) bottle
                  
                     NDC 30698-455-02 with child-resistant cap along with a 10 mL calibrated oral dosing syringe and bottle adapter.
                  
                  300 mL amber glass bottle
                  
                     NDC 30698-455-04 with child-resistant cap along with a 10 mL calibrated oral dosing syringe and bottle adapter.
                  
                  300 mL white, opaque, HDPE bottle
                  
                     NDC 30698-455-01 with child-resistant cap along with a 10 mL calibrated oral dosing syringe and bottle adapter.
                  
                  The bottle, bottle adapter and the dosing syringe are placed in a carton.
                  
                     Storage and Handling
                     
                     Store at 20°C to 25°C (68°F to 77°F). Excursions permitted between 15°C to 30°C (59°F to 86°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature]. 
    Protect from light. Discard any unused RALDESY remaining in the bottle 30 days after first opening the bottle.
adverseReactions_original:
RALDESY is contraindicated in patients taking, or within 14 days of stopping, monoamine oxidase inhibitors (MAOIs), including MAOIs such as linezolid or intravenous methylene blue, because of an increased risk of serotonin syndrome 
 
  [see
  
   Warnings and Precautions (5.2),
  
   Drug Interactions (7.1)].
